short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps users find the correct shoe size based on various foot measurement standards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Foot Sizer is a convenient Chrome extension that helps users find the correct shoe size based on various international standards using foot length measurements. Foot Sizer supports sizing systems including EU, US (men’s and women’s), UK, JP, AU, CN, KR, RU, BR, and MX, making it an essential tool for online shoe shopping or choosing sizes for international orders. Users can enter their foot length in either centimeters or inches, and Foot Sizer will automatically convert the data to display the accurate size for each system.

The extension saves the latest entered data, supports switching between light and dark themes, and offers an option to display images for easier navigation. With its simplicity and accuracy, Foot Sizer is the ideal companion for anyone looking for an efficient way to select shoe sizes.
